title: #Font Normal, Please Help to find the correct font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HAPPY-DOGS_V3_5574.jpg)
  
Hello Everyone, 

Thanks for looking at the post.

Kindly can you advice the font of Happy Dogs.

I had a feeling that they are not same " [Raleigh XBd BT (Extra Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063504/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Raleigh%20XBd%20BT%20-%20Extra%20Bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=4221e0821a49836b63a222dfb694d699&wrap=2&text=HappyDogs)"

Please advice.

Thanks  
Hasnain Munawar

Font: 

 Christian Schwartz' Stag
